adjectives.description: antipestilential (comparative more antipestilential, superlative most antipestilential)

entries.meaning: Preventing or acting as a remedy against bubonic plague or other infectious diseases.
examples: […]  during this time [when the Nile is overflowing] the Air is so antipestilential, that not only the Plague does not make a new Eruption; but is either wonderfully check’d or quite suppress’d in those houses that it has already invaded,

entries.meaning: A preventative or remedy against bubonic plague or other infectious diseases.
examples: Neither, as we may universally observe, is the Plague more shie in attaquing those that are armed with the said Antipestilentials, than others that slight all Preservatives.
